mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_supplier(supCode, supName, supDesc, supContact, supPhone, supAddress, supFax, createdUserId, createdTime) VALUES (#{supCode}, #{supName}, #{supDesc}, #{supContact}, #{supPhone}, #{supAddress}, #{supFax}, #{createdUserId}, #{createdTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_supplier
supName = #{supName},
supDesc = #{supDesc},
updatedUserId = #{updatedUserId},
updatedTime = #{updatedTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, supCode, supName, supContact, supPhone, supFax FROM t_supplier
supCode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supCode}, '%')
supName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supName}, '%')
supContact LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supContact}, '%')
createdTime = #{createdTime}

SELECT s.id, s.supCode, s.supName, s.supContact, s.supPhone, sr.srCode, sr.goodsName, sr.totalAmount, sr.payStatus FROM t_storage_record sr INNER JOIN t_supplier s ON sr.supplierId = s.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
